brainly_data.question:
Which topic is explored in the intercalary chapter of the grapes of wrath? 
A) The story of one family that has lost its farm
B) The effects of the rise of large corporations
C) The causes of the Dust Bowl
D) The events leading to the Great Depression
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
Which topic is explored in the intercalary chapter of the grapes of wrath? 
A) The story of one family that has lost its farm
B) The effects of the rise of large corporations
C) The causes of the Dust Bowl
D) The events leading to the Great Depression
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: It is answer B. The effects of the rise of large corporations.
